question: Upto what time we can pray the Fajr Salath as Ada
answer:
QUESTION
What is the last time for Performing Fajr salath as Ada? If I pray Fajr just two minutes before the sunrise will my prayer be valid as Ada?
ANSWER


Share:
Fajr Salaat time commences upon the break of Subh-e-Saadiq (true dawn) and
remains until sunrise. If the Fajr Salaat is performed within the
abovementioned time, it will be regarded as Adaa (even if may be two minutes
before the sunrise).

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
